architecture.name: Traditional East Asian wooden architecture
architecture.description: Buildings with wooden frames, curved tiled roofs, and exposed beams, commonly found in East Asia.

architecture.name: Mediterranean stone architecture
architecture.description: Light-colored stone buildings with flat roofs and small windows, typical of coastal Mediterranean regions.

climate.name: Arid desert climate
climate.description: Extremely dry conditions with minimal rainfall, clear skies, and intense sunlight.

climate.name: Subarctic climate
climate.description: Long, harsh winters with snow-covered landscapes and short, cool summers.

vegetation.name: Saguaro cactus desert vegetation
vegetation.description: Tall saguaro cacti sparsely distributed across sandy desert terrain.

vegetation.name: Dense tropical rainforest vegetation
vegetation.description: Lush, dense vegetation with tall evergreen trees, broad leaves, and thick undergrowth.

landmark.name: Eiffel Tower
landmark.description: A wrought-iron lattice tower located in Paris, France.

landmark.name: Great Pyramid of Giza
landmark.description: An ancient pyramid constructed from limestone blocks, located in Egypt.
